headline: W LAS VEGAS DEBUTS AT MANDALAY BAY
summary: MGM Resorts International (NYSE: MGM) and Marriott International, Inc. (Nasdaq: MAR) officially mark the debut of W Las Vegas, transitioning the iconic 1,117-suite tower on the Mandalay Bay campus into the globally recognized W Hotels brand. Starting today, Marriott Bonvoy members can book stays and earn and redeem points at this vibrant destination, now part of the MGM Collection with Marriott Bonvoy.
